name: Venti
desc: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

elemSkill.name: Skyward Sonnet
elemSkill.desc: #O wind upon which all hymns and songs fly, bear these earth-walkers up into the sky! {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Summons a Wind Domain at the opponent's location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching opponents into the air. Hold Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching affected opponents into the air. After unleashing the Hold version of this ability, Venti rides the wind into the air. Opponents hit by Skyward Sonnet will fall to the ground slowly. In the days when gods and men walked the earth together, the heavens were filled with countless songs. This melody has long since been forgotten.

elemBurst.name: Wind's Grand Ode
elemBurst.desc: Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge Stormeye that sucks in opponents and deals continuous Anemo DMG. Elemental Absorption If the Stormeye comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use. Many hymns written in praise of the Anemo Archon have been lost to time. This one sings of his mastery over the wind.

attackSkill.name: Normal Attack: Divine Marksmanship
attackSkill.desc:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Perform a more precise <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

c13ns.name: Splitting Gales
c13ns.desc: Fires 2 additional arrows per <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color>, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

c13ns.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
c13ns.desc: <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> decreases opponents' <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.\nOpponents launched by <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> suffer an additional 12% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

c13ns.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Hurricane of Freedom
c13ns.desc: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

c13ns.name: Concerto dal Cielo
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Storm of Defiance
c13ns.desc: Targets who take DMG from <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 20%.\nIf an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
